TopicTitle: Is there any way to move batteries from one craft to another?

Articles.Content:
I want to move one or more of these batteries over to the other base:

Can it be done?

The kerbal standing there is an engineer.

No not in stock, but with mods it is with possible you would need KAS and/or KIS you don't need both but I prefer to use both.

Hope this helps,

Kerbalstar

Yeah, KAS / KIS is the answer, here.  KIS, in particular.  It will allow an engineer on EVA, equipped with an appropriate hand-tool, to dismount the battery, carry it over to the destination craft, and mount it on there.
